hero.description: Personalized career guidance powered by advanced AI. Discover your strengths, explore career paths, and develop the skills needed for tomorrow's job market.

modal.title: PathFinder AI Demo
modal.description: Discover how AI guides your career journey

features.description: Our comprehensive platform combines cutting-edge AI with expert career guidance to provide personalized recommendations for every stage of your journey.

aiAssessment.title: AI-Powered Assessment
aiAssessment.description: Advanced algorithms analyze your skills, interests, and personality to provide personalized recommendations.

careerMapping.title: Career Path Mapping
careerMapping.description: Visualize clear roadmaps for different career paths with required skills and milestones.

marketIntelligence.title: Market Intelligence
marketIntelligence.description: Real-time insights into job market trends, salary expectations, and emerging opportunities.

skillDevelopment.title: Skill Development
skillDevelopment.description: Curated learning paths and resources to build the skills you need for your chosen career.

categoriesSection.description: Each student category has unique needs and challenges. Our platform provides specialized features and guidance tailored to your current academic stage.

readyToStart.title: Ready to Start?
readyToStart.description: Join thousands of students who have successfully navigated their career journey with our platform.

earlyStage.title: Class 8-10
earlyStage.subtitle: Early Stage / Awareness Phase
earlyStage.description: Focus on exposure, self-discovery, and reducing academic stress while exploring various career fields.

keyPoints.point1: Discover your natural strengths and interests
keyPoints.point2: Learn about different career fields in engaging ways
keyPoints.point3: Build foundational skills through interactive activities
keyPoints.point4: Develop healthy study habits and stress management

decisionMaking.title: Class 11-12
decisionMaking.subtitle: Decision-Making / Competitive Exams
decisionMaking.description: Navigate career decisions, prepare for competitive exams, and explore multiple pathways to success.

keyPoints.point1: Get clear guidance on career pathways and requirements
keyPoints.point2: Smart strategies for competitive exam preparation
keyPoints.point3: Explore alternative career options beyond traditional paths
keyPoints.point4: Connect with mentors and successful seniors

collegeAdmission.title: Post-12th Students
collegeAdmission.subtitle: College Admission Stage
collegeAdmission.description: Make informed decisions about college selection, course choices, and evaluate return on investment.

keyPoints.point1: Compare colleges based on placements, fees, and opportunities
keyPoints.point2: Match your interests with the right courses and specializations
keyPoints.point3: Calculate ROI for different education paths

skillDevelopment.title: College Students
skillDevelopment.subtitle: Skill Development / Employability Stage
skillDevelopment.description: Bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements with targeted skill development.

keyPoints.point1: Identify and fill critical skill gaps for your career goals
keyPoints.point2: Follow AI-curated learning paths for in-demand skills
keyPoints.point3: Stay updated with latest industry trends and requirements
keyPoints.point4: Get placement-ready with resume building and interview prep

calling.description: Our AI-powered calling agent is available 24/7 to assist you with your queries and provide expert guidance on your career journey.
calling.ctaText: Get instant assistance with your career queries and guidance from our AI-powered agent.

brand.name: PathfinderAI
brand.description: Empowering Indian students with AI-driven career guidance, personalized learning paths, and comprehensive skill development for the evolving job market.
